text:
Celeste Yarnall (July 26, 1944 – October 7, 2018) was an American actress. She started her career on television before moving to movies. Yarnall was born in Long Beach, California. She was known for her roles in "The Face of Eve", "The Mechanic", and in "Fatal Beauty".
Yarnall died on October 7, 2018 from peritoneal cancer in Westlake Village, California at the age of 74.
